contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 15, 2003 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-fourth-section
Test Piece Contest
Petite Suite de Ballet
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Welsh League Champions—Llwydcoed Runners Up—Crwbin Best instrumentalist Colin Evans (euphonium) Radyr. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
March 25, 2014, 9:17 p.m. July 2, 2020, 11:47 a.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Hann
2 Llwydcoed Band Alan Davies
3 Glynneath Silver Band William Cross
4 Crwbin Silver Band Julian Jones
5 Cwmtawe District Youth Band Wayne Pedrick
6 Upper Rhondda Juniors Wyndham Williams
Withdrawn Newtown Silver Band (Wales) Howard Gibbs
